short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Alternative places to buy a product while searching on amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a super simple extension. It takes the name and price of whatever you're looking at on amazon and opens a new tab searching for the item at or below that price, and with free shipping, using google shopping.
Use the checkboxes to add additional keywords to your search!
It's an easy way to not buy from amazon.
